body: The RFC you linked to is an old draft, and the sentence you mentioned is not present in the [final RFC](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.txt). That RFC has since been superseded by [7230](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230) and [7231](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231), neither of which require the server to reply with a `Connection: keep-alive` header.
